signature: String encode(final String key, final String enc) throws UnsupportedEncodingException
name: encode
javadoc:
/**
 * Encodes a string using the specified character encoding.
 *
 * @param key   The string to be encoded
 * @param enc   The character encoding to use for the encoding process
 * @return      The encoded string
 * @throws UnsupportedEncodingException if the specified encoding is not supported
 */

name: lookup
javadoc:
/**
 * Looks up a value using the provided key and returns it encoded in UTF-8.
 *
 * @param key the key to look up
 * @return the encoded value if found, or null if the key is null
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if an error occurs during encoding
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Retrieves a value associated with the specified key and returns it as a UTF-8 encoded string.
 *
 * @param key the key to look up in the underlying data store
 * @return the UTF-8 encoded value if found, or null if the key is null or not present
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if an error occurs during encoding or if the key is invalid
 */
